title: The Art of Margherita Pizza
subTitle: A guide to perfecting Italy's classic pizza
description: Learn how to make authentic Margherita pizza with fresh ingredients, traditional techniques, and beautiful presentation.
author: Mohamed

data.text: Margherita pizza is a simple yet delicious Italian classic. The key is using fresh ingredients and baking it at high heat.

data.caption: Fresh Margherita slice ready to serve

data.text: Use high-quality mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, and fresh basil. Roll out the dough evenly and bake in a preheated oven at 250Â°C for 7-10 minutes.
